mapper.select: SELECT if(pm.from_user = #{fromUser} , 'Y' , 'N') isMy, from_user fromUser, to_user toUser, id, time, type, message, u.avatar avatar FROM private_msg pm LEFT JOIN user u ON pm.from_user = u.user_id WHERE ( pm.from_user = #{fromUser} AND pm.to_user = #{toUser} ) OR ( pm.from_user = #{toUser} AND pm.to_user = #{fromUser} ) and is_delete = 'N' ORDER BY pm.time
